item.title: TLSTTS - 2019 Season Analysis
item.description: Overview Winners and Losers Round Robin Analysis Position Performance Conclusion Overview This site will serve as a repository for analysis of the 2019 The League Season Thunderdome: The Sequel NFL Fantasy season. Our league is hosted on the fantastic Sleeper platform and data are is are (ok, fine) is pulled using the Sleeper API.

item.title: TLSTTS - Margin and Pythagorean Analysis
item.description: Overview Margin of Victory Analysis Pythagorean Win Expectation What is This? Adapting for Football Empirical Exponent Overview This post will cover material analyzed in a prior weekly update. In the first week of the 2019 NFL Season, some of the results I came across motivated me to look into historical margin of victory.

item.title: TLSTTS - 2018 Season Recap
item.description: Introduction Overall Season Performance Overall Weekly Performance Position Performance Player Performance Conclusion Appendix What the Hell is an API? // When the document is fully rendered... $(document).ready(function() { // ...select all header elements... $('h1, h2, h3, h4, h5').each(function() { // ...and add an id to them corresponding to their 'titles' $(this).attr('id', $(this).html()); }); }); Introduction Some might say that doing a data-driven retrospective on a previous season as the current season starts is a little useless.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a site set up by Nick Criswell, mostly for fantasy sports analytics. The site was built using Hugo’s Lithium theme and created via the blogdown package in R.
